title: Withdraw Crypto
description: Withdraw crypto to an external account. To move funds between Zignaly accounts, use a transfer instead.

withdrawAddress.label: Withdraw to Address:
withdrawAddress.warning: Only send {{network}} {{coin}} tokens to this address

withdrawMemo.label: MEMO/Tag:
withdrawMemo.invalid: MEMO/Tag is invalid, please review your target wallet network details

validation.indicateAnAddress: You must indicate an valid address.

confirmation.title: Confirm Withdrawal
confirmation.description: Please confirm the information is correct and submit your withdrawal.

success.title: Withdrawal Success
success.description: Your withdrawal request has been sent and should be processed shortly.
